level.heading: Exemption for real property of certain water-works corporations.
level.text: * ยง 11-245.2 Exemption for real property of certain water-works corporations. Real property owned by a water-works corporation subject to the provisions of the public service law and used exclusively for the sale, furnishing and distribution of water for domestic, commercial and public purposes, shall not be taxable. * NB Added L.L. 55/85 ยง 1, language juxtaposed per Ch. 907/85 ยง 14 * NB Number supplied by the Legislative Bill Drafting Commission
